title: Very strange font I found
content:
Hi!  
I found this font on a poster in my town. I don't know from were it come from and the automatic forms to ID a font like WhatTheFont didn't found anything! It's completely kidding me! That's why I'm asking you to help me!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152616im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0711_6099.JPG)

Thanks, Valentin.

Font: 

 TJ Evolette 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152616/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: ValentinDu

comments.content:
Same sort of idea as TJ Evolette A [http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152616/http:/26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/ "http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/") but seems to be a different one.  
Don
Thanks Don, TJ Evolette A looks like the one I'm searching. It had the same principe but it's not that! but thanks! Valentin
After taking a deeper look a TJ Evolette font, It look likes the font I'm searching is a one of the many variation of TJ Evolette! Thanks a lot Don! :)
